array.string: You can select an arbitrary part of the image by creating a new layer, using the paintbrush to trace what you want to select and then choosing "Select Alpha" from the "Edit" menu.
It possible for Seashore to open images in the SVG format using a special Java-based add-on. You can download this add-on from Seashore's website.
You can make a new image that is the same size as the clipboard's contents using the "Presets" pop-down menu in the bottom-left of the new image dialog.
You can make it so the configuration panel for effects appear in a separate dialog rather than a sheet through the preferences.
You can reduce the number of warning messages Seashore displays through the preferences. To access the preferences select "Preferences..." from the "Seashore" menu.
When specifying an image size, you can cycle through various units of measurement (namely pixels, inches and millimetres) by clicking on the unit's label.
